name: Puzzle 3D
description:
The goal of jigsaw puzzle is to restore the original jigsaw puzzles,
This is a 3D puzzle, so you will encounter the challenges you haven't met in 2D plane puzzle!

Each scene will have three levels.
Rotate, pan, push and pull puzzles as well
The distance of the game's sight, rotation, and pan around are controlled by the mouse,
The left top corner of the game there will be a simple prompt.
